attributes.action: All those in GOVERNMENT should be routinely drug tested.
attributes.additional_details: The behavior and language used by several high ranked Government officials is, and has been, completely unacceptable, lacking morals, empathy and integrity.
attributes.background:
I want the Government to behave with integrity and at least to the standards the rest of society is held to.

Elite sports and many other fields have routine mandatory drug testing. All those representing the people of the UK, in any field, should be held to the same standards

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want to see mandatory drug testing, but we're not sure if you want this to apply to Government Ministers, civil servants, or all elected representatives and workers in any level of Government,

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Make random drug/alcohol testing mandatory for Members of Parliament: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584162
